channel.title: Check
channel.description: OK so i always wanted to know how to do one thing.Well lets stake and item right.U can weald that item and it doesnt have bugs or anything like a hat.But the problem is it goes in weapon palce not hat place.How could u switch that place up does anyone know.Or is it impossible? Thanks

item.title: Check
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

csrsniper254:

ud. There is nothing to delete… all id’s that are not included in the item.java file are automatically considered weapons. there is not an ID in a line called public static int weapons[] considering that line of coding does not exist. So there is not an ID to actually delete. Unless you were stupid enough to classify a cape as a platebody.

I forgot about that i wasnt looking at the file while doing it.

Read full topic

item.title: Check
item.dc:creator: @csrsniper254 csrsniper254
item.description:
@csrsniper254 wrote:

Ok, here is what you do. Open item.java. Find the id for the item. Lets use a dragon chainbody as an example. The ID is 3140 (you have to have the unnoted id!). So you open item.java you should see public static int body []. Add 3140, (remember the space after the comma) to that line.

In your case add (hat ID), to the line that says “public static int hats”

Tell me if you need more help.

Read full topic

item.title: Check
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

Go to item.java and search for the item id. Delete that from whever it is if its not in there its ok. Then if its a hat look for

public static int hats[] = { And add the item id in there.

Hope this helps.
